trigger: Dryer vented with plastic or foil flex duct
action_item: Replace with smooth metal duct per code. Secure all joints and ensure vent terminates outside with a backdraft damper.
documentation: Photo of corrected venting, materials used, and job file update.
policy_text: Plastic or foil dryer ducts are a known fire hazard and must be replaced with code-compliant metal duct.

trigger: Dryer vent terminates in attic or crawlspace
action_item: Extend dryer vent to terminate at exterior wall or soffit with backdraft damper. Do not leave vent open in building cavities.
documentation: Photo of vent termination at exterior, inspection record.
policy_text: Dryer vents must discharge to the outside; interior termination is prohibited due to moisture and fire risk.

trigger: Exterior dryer vent hood missing or backdraft damper missing/broken
action_item: Install code-compliant vent hood with working backdraft damper. Document before further weatherization work.
documentation: Photo of vent hood installation, damper test/inspection.
policy_text: Dryer vents must include a functioning backdraft damper to prevent air and pest intrusion.

trigger: Dryer vent obstructed or full of debris/lint
action_item: Clean vent and verify airflow before completing project. Replace if duct cannot be cleaned.
documentation: Photo before/after cleaning, client education on maintenance.
policy_text: Blocked dryer vents are a fire and health hazard; must be clear for safe operation.
